sections.MISSION:
1st Squadron, Bull Troop, Second Platoon, conducts a Reconnaissance of Urban Assault Course on 19-20MAR25 IOT increase Infantry PLT reporting.
Task organization: OIC: 1LT Burns
NCOIC: SSG Luna
Ammo Handler: N/A
Alt Ammo Handler: N/A
Training PAX: 2nd Platoon
sections.KEY TASKS:
Certify squads on concealment, sUas operations, hide sites/surf sites.
Study OPFOR movements and send reports to higher.
sections.EXECUTION: ): Platoon will convoy to the range. Upon occupation of the range, the Platoon will occupy an ORP to leave from to go to their S&O. Phase 3:(Reconsolidation): Platoon will convoy back to Troop. Troops will consolidate weapons and conduct recovery operations.
sections.END STATE: All Kombat Koala Infantry Teams are certified on recon operations in a tactical environment at night and are prepared to execute higher level training.
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Phase 1: (Planning): Team leaders will plan and coordinate their respective assigned classes of Area Recon and prepare all training material. Classes will be verified by SSG Luna and LT Burns.
